QualityProductsDescription: We bring you the highest quality and delicious frozen products. We carefully select each product and present it to you.
CustomerSatisfactionDescription: Our priority is always our customers' satisfaction and trust.
SafeProductionDescription: We produce in our modern facilities in accordance with hygiene and quality standards. We guarantee our quality with ISO certifications.
AboutDescription:
My Golden Food Food Industry and Trade Inc. is a frozen food producer company established to serve in all parts of frozen food. The company's main brand name is Moonlife.

It has started the production packaging process with fruits. Some of the 350 gr bowl (plastic) packaging products from the Berry group have been activated and are being produced.

These products;

1- Strawberry
2- Blackberry
3- Raspberry
4- Blueberry
5- Cherry
6- 3 Mixed Forest Fruits (Raspberry Blackberry, Strawberry)
7- 4 Mixed forest fruits (Red Currant, Blueberry, Raspberry, Blackberry)
VisionDescription: to introduce our taste worldwide and provide healthy and delicious products to everyone with a sustainable production approach.
MissionDescription: to provide our customers with the highest quality frozen food products, making their daily lives easier and ensuring they have delicious moments.
RDAndInnovationDescription: We are constantly developing with our R&D efforts, producing innovative solutions. We stand out with our technology-oriented production processes.
